core:description.text: A rounded snifter cradled in the palm, warming the mahogany-colored brandy within. The wide bowl narrows to concentrate the intoxicating bouquet of dried fruit, vanilla, and aged oak that rises with each gentle swirl.

containers-core:liquid_container.flavorText: The brandy glides across the palate like liquid velvet, revealing layers of raisin, dried apricot, and honeyed warmth. A gentle heat blossoms in the chest as the complex finish lingers with notes of almond and spice.
